      • verifyFieldsEmbarkVehicle

      • embarkVehicle

        public void embarkVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
                   throws EmbarkException
        Adds a vehicle to the car ferry if it is possible. The row is chosen according to the weight of the vehicle, for keeping the balance.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - The vehicle to be added.
        Throws:
        EmbarkException - If the vehicle can't be embarked.

      • embarkVehicle

        public void embarkVehicle()
                   throws EmbarkException
        Adds a vehicle to the car ferry if it is possible. The vehicle is created from the values set on the fields of the embarkation form The row is chosen according to the weight of the vehicle, for keeping the balance.
        Throws:
        EmbarkException - If the vehicle can't be embarked.

      • disembarkVehicle

        public Vehicle disembarkVehicle()
        Removes a vehicle from the car ferry. It's the first vehicle in the row. The row is chosen according to the weight of the vehicle, for keeping the balance.
        Returns:
        The vehicle that has been removed.
